amendment.description: An amendment numbered 430 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to pay the salary of any officer or employee of the Department of Health and Human Services, the Department of Labor, or the Department of the Treasury who takes any action to specify or define, through regulations, guidelines, or otherwise, essential benefits under section 1302 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pitts amendment (A155) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 183 (Roll no. 141).
